${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:BlankCanvas.NAME: Blank Canvas
${ModID}:BlankCanvas.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL your cards in your draw pile. NL Draw as many cards as there were in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BlankCanvas.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL your cards in your draw pile. NL Draw as many cards as there were in your hand.

${ModID}:Dispersion.NAME: Dispersion
${ModID}:Dispersion.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Add 3 cards to your hand of the same cost, type and color respectively.
${ModID}:Dispersion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Add 3 Upgraded cards to your hand of the same cost, type and color respectively.

${ModID}:Imagination.NAME: Imagination
${ModID}:Imagination.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card of a color you don't have in hand.

${ModID}:UVFlash.NAME: UV Flash
${ModID}:UVFlash.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|<1=Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak instead.|@=Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.} NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:MuddyMix.NAME: Muddy Mix
${ModID}:MuddyMix.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand. Gain !B! Block and draw 1 card for each different color exhausted. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RainbowShell.NAME: Rainbow Shell
${ModID}:RainbowShell.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|<1=Ethereal. NL }Prevent the next time you are attacked.

${ModID}:ShimmeringBandage.NAME: Shimmering Mend
${ModID}:ShimmeringBandage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LaserFocus.NAME: Laser Focus
${ModID}:LaserFocus.DESCRIPTION: {@@} Choose {!M!|1=a card|@=!M! cards} in your draw pile. NL Play and exhaust {!M!|1=it|@=them}. NL Exhaust.
